$MRVL Marvell to Buy Rival Chip Company Inphi in Cash-and-Stock Deal

https://www.thestreet.com/investing/marvell-mrvl-inphi-iphi-chip-merger

links.title: Marvell to Buy Rival Chip Company Inphi in Cash-and-Stock Deal
links.description: Marvell Technology reached an agreement to acquire rival semiconductor company Inphi in a cash-and-stock deal. The deal marks the second big tie-up of semiconductor companies this week, following Advanced Micro Devices' $35 billion acquisition of Xilinx . Marvell said in a statement Thursday it intends to reorganize so that the combined company will be domiciled in the United States.

messages.body:
$IPHI $MRVL Marvell acquiring Inphi for $40B; Inphi shares soar 34% 

https://newsfilter.io/a/7fc6dcb47522c7c928ec604927533f64

links.title: Marvell acquiring Inphi for $40B; Inphi shares soar 34%
links.description: Inphi shares soar 34% pre-market after formally announcing it will be acquired by Marvell in a cash and stock transaction with an enterprise value of $40B.The transaction includes $66 in cash and 2.323 shares of the combined company for Inphi holders.

("Marvell") issued a joint press release with Inphi Corporation ("Inphi") announcing theexecution of an Agreement and Plan of Merger and Reorganization (the "Merger Agreement"), made and entered into as of October 29, 2020, by and among Marvell, Inphi, Maui HoldCo, Inc., Maui Acquisition Company Ltd.
